Straightshot can't help but cuddle the babies, giving them both kisses on t=
heir heads and then tickling them a little more on their tummies.

" Now I =
see why Daddy can't put you guys down. You're just too cute not ta pick you=
 up.  You two sure make great parents, Talon.   Who knows?  I bet you'll ha=
ve more kids down the road.  But if my brother gets too playful, don't be a=
fraid ta get Em back.  Tucson can be over playful when he wants ta be."

Lo=
cal artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital m=
edia.
